properties.tune: Girls Just Wanna Have Fun - ish
properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Where go the maids on summer's day When the Falcon bears their men away

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: Sing willow a willow away hey hey Sing willow a willow away Sing willow a willow away

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Gone to the hall to step a dance While their good lovers break a lance

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: And drink their mead where it is kept While their good lovers drink their sweat

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: And trade they kisses with young beaus While their good husbands trade at blows

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: And when the Falcon comes to nest They welcome their good men to rest

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: For lords may ken to battle's run But a lady too will have her fun
